monogr.title: The New Testament in the original Greek

tagsDecl.tagUsage: Marks poetical language. within the running text.
Marks material quoted from other biblical texts.

bibl.title: Thesaurus Linguae Graecae canon of Greek authors and works
bibl.author: Luci Berkowitz
Karl A. Squitier

change.item:
$Log: nt_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.5 2013-03-04 17:20:05 lcerrato added mh in Matthew 5 34
Revision 1.4 2013-01-22 19:10:51 lcerrato oeou to qeou in Romans 2.24
Revision 1.3 2012-02-22 19:34:27 lcerrato fixed typo
Revision 1.2 2011-11-07 15:46:23 lcerrato changed teta/paktai to teta/raktai on John 12.27 per report
Revision 1.1 2009-10-08 19:10:56 rsingh04 began reorganizing texts module by collection. created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files
Revision 1.16 2009/09/08 20:30:41 lcerrato fixed typo
Revision 1.15 2009/06/17 14:32:20 student *** empty log message ***
Revision 1.14 2009/05/27 16:11:31 rsingh04 added/fixed cvs log keyword

div1.head: *i*o*u*d*a
div1.p:
*i*o*u*d*a*s *)ihsou= *xristou= dou=los, a)delfo\s de\
*)iakw/bou, toi=s e)n qew=| patri\ h)gaphme/nois kai\ *)ihsou= *xristw=| tethrhme/nois klhtoi=s:
e)/leos u(mi=n kai\ ei)rh/nh kai\ a)ga/ph
plhqunqei/h.
*)agaphtoi/, pa=san spoudh\n poiou/menos gra/fein u(mi=n
peri\ th=s koinh=s h(mw=n swthri/as a)na/gkhn e)/sxon gra/yai
u(mi=n parakalw=n e)pagwni/zesqai th=| a(/pac paradoqei/sh|
toi=s a(gi/ois pi/stei.
pareisedu/hsan ga/r tines a)/nqrwpoi, oi(
pa/lai progegramme/noi ei)s tou=to to\ kri/ma, a)sebei=s, th\n
tou= qeou= h(mw=n xa/rita metatiqe/ntes ei)s a)se/lgeian kai\ to\n
mo/non despo/thn kai\ ku/rion h(mw=n *)ihsou=n *xristo\n a)rnou/menoi.
*(upomnh=sai de\ u(ma=s bou/lomai, ei)do/tas
a(/pac pa/nta, o(/ti *ku/rios lao\n e)k gh=s *ai)gu/ptou sw/sas
to\ deu/teron tou\s mh\ pisteu/santas a)pw/lesen,
a)gge/lous
te tou\s mh\ thrh/santas th\n e(autw=n a)rxh\n a)lla\ a)polipo/ntas
to\ i)/dion oi)khth/rion ei)s kri/sin mega/lhs h(me/ras
desmoi=s a)i+di/ois u(po\ zo/fon teth/rhken:
w(s *so/doma kai\
*go/morra kai\ ai( peri\ au)ta\s po/leis, to\n o(/moion tro/pon
tou/tois e)kporneu/sasai kai\ a)pelqou=sai o)pi/sw sarko\s
e(te/ras, pro/keintai dei=gma puro\s ai)wni/ou di/khn u(pe/xousai.
*(omoi/ws me/ntoi kai\ ou(=toi e)nupniazo/menoi
sa/rka me\n miai/nousin, kurio/thta de\ a)qetou=sin, do/cas de\
blasfhmou=sin.
*(o de\ *mixah\l o( a)rxa/ggelos, o(/te tw=|
diabo/lw| diakrino/menos diele/geto peri\ tou= *mwuse/ws sw/matos,
ou)k e)to/lmhsen kri/sin e)penegkei=n blasfhmi/as,
a)lla\ ei)=pen *)epitimh/sai soi *ku/rios.
*ou(=toi de\ o(/sa
me\n ou)k oi)/dasin blasfhmou=sin, o(/sa de\ fusikw=s w(s
ta\ a)/loga zw=|a e)pi/stantai, e)n tou/tois fqei/rontai.
ou)ai\
au)toi=s, o(/ti th=| o(dw=| tou= *kai\n e)poreu/qhsan, kai\ th=| pla/nh|
tou= *balaa\m misqou= e)cexu/qhsan, kai\ th=| a)ntilogi/a| tou=
*kore\ a)pw/lonto.
ou(=toi/ ei)sin oi( e)n tai=s a)ga/pais u(mw=n spila/des
suneuwxou/menoi, a)fo/bws e(autou\s poimai/nontes, nefe/lai a)/nudroi u(po\ a)ne/mwn parafero/menai, de/ndra
fqinopwrina\ a)/karpa di\s a)poqano/nta e)krizwqe/nta,
ku/mata
a)/gria qala/sshs e)pafri/zonta ta\s e(autw=n ai)sxu/nas, a)ste/res
planh=tai oi(=s o( zo/fos tou= sko/tous ei)s ai)w=na teth/rhtai.
*)eprofh/teusen de\ kai\ tou/tois e(/bdomos
a)po\ *)ada\m *(enw\x le/gwn *)idou\ h)=lqen *ku/rios e)n a(gi/ais muria/sin au)tou=,
poih=sai kri/sin kata\ pa/ntwn kai\ e)le/gcai
pa/ntas tou\s a)sebei=s peri\ pa/ntwn tw=n e)/rgwn a)sebei/as
au)tw=n w(=n h)se/bhsan kai\ peri\ pa/ntwn tw=n sklhrw=n w(=n
e)la/lhsan kat' au)tou= a(martwloi\ a)sebei=s.
*ou(=toi/ ei)sin goggustai/, memyi/moiroi, kata\ ta\s e)piqumi/as
au)tw=n poreuo/menoi, kai\ to\ sto/ma au)tw=n lalei= u(pe/rogka,
qauma/zontes pro/swpa w)feli/as xa/rin.
*(umei=s de/, a)gaphtoi/, mnh/sqhte tw=n r(hma/twn tw=n proeirhme/nwn
u(po\ tw=n a)posto/lwn tou= kuri/ou h(mw=n *)ihsou= *xristou=:
o(/ti e)/legon u(mi=n *)ep' e)sxa/tou xro/nou e)/sontai
e)mpai=ktai kata\ ta\s e(autw=n e)piqumi/as poreuo/menoi tw=n
a)sebeiw=n.
*ou(=toi/ ei)sin oi( a)podiori/zontes, yuxikoi/, pneu=ma
mh\ e)/xontes.
*(umei=s de/, a)gaphtoi/, e)poikodomou=ntes
e(autou\s th=| a(giwta/th| u(mw=n pi/stei, e)n pneu/mati a(gi/w|
proseuxo/menoi,
e(autou\s e)n a)ga/ph| qeou= thrh/sate prosdexo/menoi
to\ e)/leos tou= kuri/ou h(mw=n *)ihsou= *xristou=
ei)s zwh\n ai)w/nion.
*kai\ ou(\s me\n e)lea=te diakrinome/nous
sw/zete e)k puro\s a(rpa/zontes,
ou(\s de\ e)lea=te e)n fo/bw|,
misou=ntes kai\ to\n a)po\ th=s sarko\s e)spilwme/non xitw=na.
*tw=| de\ duname/nw| fula/cai u(ma=s a)ptai/stous kai\
sth=sai katenw/pion th=s do/chs au)tou= a)mw/mous e)n a)gallia/sei
mo/nw| qew=| swth=ri h(mw=n dia\ *)ihsou= *xristou=
tou= kuri/ou h(mw=n do/ca megalwsu/nh kra/tos kai\ e)cousi/a
pro\ panto\s tou= ai)w=nos kai\ nu=n kai\ ei)s pa/ntas tou\s
ai)w=nas: a)mh/n.
